$Bishop Ignacio$
Hello! How the current situation now? I am trying to convince the nobles
(You must talk to Argenta at Foothills of Black Mountain.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>So.. This need to be done again?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Things are getting more complex. Not just the fact that Black Dragon had awakened, but a Nest has already being created.
I had to obtain the Ancient Celebrant's Rune 50 years ago, for the same reason of having to break through the Black Dragon's Nest.

$Argenta$
Of course it would be better if Geraint could find an alternate solution, till then I think I should create the Ancient Celebrant's Rune.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>First... I guess I should collect the Rune Shards.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
To create the Ancient Celebrant's Rune, we would required Rune Shard which would be created into a complete Rune and it must be create into a whole with a Core that will instill with my power.
You know what to do now, right?

$Argenta$
Indeed, you know what to do.However you are weak as of now, are you able teo collect the Rune Shard? You will die first before picking your first one up

$Argenta$
You seem hype up. But we are unable go right now despite being near to an Ancient
Let's speed up and collect Rune Shards.

$Argenta$
You know nothing about this? Do you know of a place called Dried Marissa Spring? Recently there a device that gathered up Black powers, it could still contain some broken runes

$Argenta$
You need to be detail in looking and you be able to find it
Look around carefully and bring back 10.

$Bishop Ignacio$
Do not worry, I trying my best to convince the nobles. But how it go over there?
(You must talk to Argenta at Foothills of Black Mountain.)

$Argenta$
If you look carefully around Dried Marissa Spring, you should find a rune. They may just be broken Shards, but it could be created into a complete Rune. So be vigiliant and bring some back

$Argenta$
Hmm... it not too bad, but a monkey could also had done it. But hey I not saying your bad, but you did pretty well for a person like you

$Argenta$
Humans and the Ancient had not changed at all since the past (Argenta feels the rune with her hands.) If not for the foolish humans who had ruined it, it could have become a complete rune

$Argenta$
A few anicents decided to do something funny to it. They conducted an experiment that should not have been done. Humans always tend to do thing that they are not suspose to do. If only they are as naive and dumb as you, this would not had happen

$Argenta$
Well anyway, I'm going to use this to create the Ancient Celebrant's Rune. Collecting many broken pieces and fixing it up like a jigsaw puzzle. Which is so simple that any one could do it. But I am doing it for you. So you should be thanking me

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well then, I will go and report to the Royal Castle.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Ha ha ha. It is easier to said than done, and it does not mean that you can do it right away, for me to do it, it also required a little time.
Why don't you train in the meantime.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Hey, stay positive and not pessimistic okie.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Report Wake up your ideas. Stop harbor expectation from the humans

$Argenta$
I am not being pessimistic, I just be realistic. You're a child who has yet to see the real world, Humans ain't as innocent as you thought they are, if they are as innocent as you thing would not had happen

$Argenta$
I should divert my attention to this instead of chatting with you that get me annoyed
Go to the Royal Castle and report request do whatever you like

$Argenta$
I should divert my attention to this instead of chatting with you that get me annoyed
Go to the Royal Castle and report request do whatever you like

$Bishop Ignacio$
I knew the nest has being created, but a normal pair of eye cant be seen, but I have the Sage's Eyes. (Ignacio shows you a an orb with a peculiar shape.)

$Bishop Ignacio$
It is a mysterious yet historic item that was used 50 years ago in the Dragon Raid. It release a powerful light when it forms a powerful barrier around the area. The Nest is a very powerful barrier, so its form can be known through this orb.

$Bishop Ignacio$
Who has created the Nest?
Is it the Black Knight who kidnapped the Prophet?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(The Bishop moaned and put his hands together.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
Wait!! You mean the...Black Dragon has awakened?!
Oh no... This is the worst thing that can happen, may god bless Saint's Heaven

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You know about the Ancient Celebrant's Rune?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
Things are looking worst each day, and it look inevitable that a full scale war is going to happen. But luckily, Argent is creating theAncient Celebrant's Rune, so that's something off of our burden.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>We better hurry up now and rescue him then...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
As far as I know, it was an item that was used to break through the Black Dragon's Nest, 50 years ago.
I cant accept the fact that Black Dragon has revived, Someone need to protect the prophet.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Bishop take a look at you while being deep in thought)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
Saint Haven could be attacked by monster anytime since the Black Dragon has awakened. We need to locate the Prophet before this happens.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Bishop Ignacio$
We are trying to gather Templar Knights while the King and Nobles are being persuaded in preparation for war
Please trust me and wait a little longer

The Ancient Celebrant's Rune is needed to break into the Nest. Talk to Argenta about how to create it.

Foothills of Black Mountain → Argenta
journal.destination: Talk to Argenta at Footshill of Foothills of Black Mountain

journal.title: Rune Shards
journal.contents:
Go Dried Marissa Spring and collect the Rune Shards.

Foothills of Black Mountain(Lonely Forest Path) → Dried Marissa Spring
